loadFromStudentRedirect.title: Load Courses from Student Plan
loadFromStudentRedirect.p1: To load courses according to your study plan, you need to log in to the STAG information system.
loadFromStudentRedirect.p2: After clicking "Continue", you will be redirected to the UWB login page (Orion login). After successful login, you will be automatically returned to the Schedule Planner application.
loadFromStudentRedirect.p3: This application does not store your login credentials. The temporary access key (ticket) obtained is used only for communication with the STAG API during this session.
loadFromStudentRedirect.faqLink: More information about security and login functionality

loadCourseFromSTAG.title: Load Course from STAG
loadCourseFromSTAG.errorCourseCodeFormat: Invalid code format (e.g., KIV/PPA1 or KIV/PCPP-CV).

hero.title: Schedule Planner for WCU
hero.description: Easily plan your semester schedule, optimize your time, and be prepared for enrollments. An intuitive tool for students of the University of West Bohemia.

functions.intro: Discover tools that will simplify your semester planning and maximize your efficiency.

func1.title: Load from STAG
func1.desc: Import courses and their schedule events directly from the IS/STAG university system by course code or your study plan.

func2.title: Visual Schedule Editor
func2.desc: Clearly assemble and edit your schedule in an intuitive Czech-format table view.

func3.title: Preference Management
func3.desc: Define your priorities – free days, times to avoid, or preferred instructors.

func4.title: Automatic Generation
func4.desc: Let the application suggest optimal schedule variants based on your courses and set preferences.

func5.title: Save and Export
func5.desc: Save your work in the browser, export your workspace to a file, or download the finished schedule as an image.

func6.title: Responsive Design
func6.desc: Plan your schedule comfortably on your computer, tablet, or mobile phone.

tech.reactDesc: A modern JavaScript library for building user interfaces.
tech.muiDesc: A comprehensive suite of React components implementing Material Design.
tech.viteDesc: A next-generation fast frontend build tool for web projects.
tech.i18nextDesc: A powerful internationalization framework for JavaScript applications.

author.summary: This Schedule Planner was created as part of a bachelor's thesis at the Faculty of Applied Sciences, University of West Bohemia in Pilsen. The goal was to create a modern and user-friendly tool for students.

faqPage.title: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
faqPage.a1: WCU Schedule Planner is a tool designed for students of the University of West Bohemia to help them visualize and plan their semester schedules. It allows loading courses from STAG, adding them to the schedule, setting preferences, and generating possible schedule variants.
faqPage.q2: How can I load my courses?
faqPage.a2: You can load courses in several ways: individually using the course code from STAG, in bulk for your entire study plan (requires STAG login), or by importing a previously saved workspace from a file.
faqPage.q3: How does STAG login work? Is it secure?
faqPage.a3: To load courses from your study plan, we use the standard STAG login mechanism (via UWB Orion login). You enter your credentials (username and password) directly on the UWB website; our application does not have access to them. After successful login, we only obtain a temporary anonymous key (a "ticket") that allows us to retrieve publicly available information about courses and your study plan. This key is valid only for a limited time and does not permit any changes to your studies. The application does not store this key anywhere.
faqPage.q4: What happens to my data when I close the application?
faqPage.a4: The application saves your workspace (loaded courses, enrolled events, preferences) only to your browser's local storage. This data is not sent to any server and remains solely with you. If you wish, you can export your workspace to a file and later import it again. Clearing browser data or using incognito mode may result in data loss if not exported.
faqPage.q5: Why are some courses or schedule events not displaying?
faqPage.a5: Ensure you have correctly set the academic year and semester for loading courses in the "Load Courses from STAG" or "Parameters for Loading Field of Study Courses" dialog. Data in STAG may not always be complete, especially for future periods or less common event types. The application displays only the data provided by the STAG API. If the problem persists, verify the data availability directly in the STAG system.
faqPage.q6: Can I officially enroll in courses through this application?
faqPage.a6: No. This application is solely for visualizing and planning your schedule. Official enrollment in courses and schedule events must be done through the standard STAG/UWB Portal system within the specified deadlines.
faqPage.q7: How does schedule generation and preferences work?
faqPage.a7: The schedule generator tries to find combinations of enrolled schedule events that do not conflict and also meet your specified preferences (e.g., a free day, preferred time, preferred instructor). The more preferences you set, the more complex the generation can be, and it may not always lead to finding an optimal schedule. Preferences have a weight (priority) that you can change.
